ABOUT

ABOUT

Hi, my name is Steph, and I'm super happy that you're here!

If you're feeling stuck, you've come to the right place.

Since you're here right now, something tells me that you're ready for change. Ready to fill your life with happiness, ready to find your true purpose, ready for a little more inner peace.

Regardless of where you are along your path, now is the time to go deeper, feel more connected, and finally live in alignment with your dreams and desires.

Maybe you...

  • have no clue where to begin
  • need help to understand your thoughts and feelings
  • feel alone...but friend, you're not

I understand that you need guidance sometimes, we all do.

And I'm here to remind you that you have all the answers inside you.

I'm going to help you go within and dig out all that shit that is preventing you from thriving and living your best life.

You CAN heal your life.

I believe that we all have the capacity to heal from past experiences, and I will be sharing with you the diffcult stories of my life, and how I've healed.

I believe that you deserve love, happiness, and fulfillment.

I believe that a big part of you desperately wants to connect to yourself.

I'm going to show you how to transform your thoughts and emotions into tools that will help you rather than hurt you.

I'm excited to be on this journey together.




My name is Stephanie Mankarios, and I am DEEPLY passionate about helping others.

Rewind to a few years ago...

I did something that shocked everyone around me.

In the middle of a semester studying Psychology in university, I had a strong gut feeling that I needed to go to Bali.

I did not hesitate & booked a ticket to leave that same week.

My journey there led me to my first Yoga Teacher Training.

What an experience. This changed my life.

I discovered a whole new world of being. A whole new world of people. And a whole new world of thinking.

This experience ignited in me the desire to go deep within, and ever since, I have been journeying into the path of self-discovery, and along the way, helping people from all walks of life.

Moving through this path, I went to India, to the capital of spirituality; Rishikesh. Along with another Yoga Teacher Training, I began to study and understand principles and teachings that have been around for thousands of years. This allowed me to understand how inner peace & well-being come from physical as well as mental practices.

In my coaching and in my blog I combine teachings from the East and teachings from the West because a mix of spirituality and psychology have helped me transform and I believe they can create powerful tools to help YOU. I am profoundly passionate about helping people, knowing what it's like to suffer from anxiety, depression and PTSD.

I have a love for guiding people (in Yoga & Coaching) through a journey of inner self-discovery and truth, helping Women, Men, and Children to unveil the illusions of fear and suffering and find inner peace, happiness and purpose.

I am NOT here to be your guru.

I am here to guide you back to yourself.

I am here to show you that YOU can be your biggest teacher.

I am here to remind you that you have EVERYTHING you need inside you.

You deserve to remember & connect to your higher self, and I'm here to help.

Start helping yourself today by clicking below, and I look forward to hearing from you :)

Thank you for being here.

Love, Steph.
